Package arez.spy

Spy events and introspection utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentInfo
    A representation of a component instance exposed to spy framework.
    ComputedValueInfo
    A representation of a ComputedValue instance exposed to spy framework.
    ElementInfo
    A representation of an element exposed to spy framework.
    ObservableInfo
    A representation of an observable instance exposed to spy framework.
    ObserverInfo
    A representation of a observer instance exposed to spy framework.
    PropertyAccessor<T>
    Returning the value of an Observable.
    PropertyMutator<T>
    Changing the value of an Observable.
    SerializableEvent
    Interface used to serialize events.
    TransactionInfo
    Spy interface into transaction data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionCompletedEvent
    Notification when Action completes.
    ActionStartedEvent
    Notification when Action starts.
    ComponentCreateCompletedEvent
    Notification when a Component is has finished being created.
    ComponentCreateStartedEvent
    Notification when a Component is starting to be created.
    ComponentDisposeCompletedEvent
    Notification when a Component dispose has completed.
    ComponentDisposeStartedEvent
    Notification when a Component is disposed.
    ComputeCompletedEvent
    Notification when Computation completes.
    ComputedValueActivatedEvent
    ComputedValue has activated.
    ComputedValueCreatedEvent
    ComputedValue has been created.
    ComputedValueDeactivatedEvent
    ComputedValue has de-activated.
    ComputedValueDisposedEvent
    ComputedValue has been disposed.
    ComputeStartedEvent
    Notification when Computation starts.
    ObservableChangedEvent
    Notification when Observable has changed.
    ObservableCreatedEvent
    Notification when Observable is created.
    ObservableDisposedEvent
    Notification when Observable is disposed.
    ObserverCreatedEvent
    Notification when Observer is created.
    ObserverDisposedEvent
    Notification when Observer is disposed.
    ObserverErrorEvent
    Notification when Observer produces an error.
    ReactionCompletedEvent
    Notification when Observer completes reaction.
    ReactionScheduledEvent
    Notification when reaction scheduled.
    ReactionStartedEvent
    Notification when Observer starts reaction to some changes.
    TransactionCompletedEvent
    Notification when Transaction completes.
    TransactionStartedEvent
    Notification when Transaction starts.

Package arez.spy Description

Spy events and introspection utilities. The arez package and this package are highly inter-dependent but they are kept separated as production builds typically compile out everything in this package when spies are disabled.
